description:
Permit to purchase 7 crafting materials.

Allows you to purchase the following crafting materials at shops:
Red Gel

Allows you to purchase the following crafting materials at the Verte Workshop:
Shiny Fang, Azure Fluffy Tail, Toxic Stinger, Alluring Cloth, Enticing Jar, Iron Core

*These items can also be attained normally in-game.

*After installing DLC, start the game or load a save file from the Main Menu to access it.
*This DLC is also available as part of a set. Please be careful not to purchase the same product twice.
name: Intermediate Crafting Set
